title: Former Canonical Developer Advocate Warns Snap Store Isn't Safe After Slow Responses to Malware Reports
full_text: Former Canonical Developer Advocate Warns Snap Store Isn't Safe After Slow Responses to Malware Reports. An anonymous reader shared this article from the blog Linuxiac In a blog post, Alan Pope, a longtime Ubuntu community figure and former Canonical employee who remains an active Snap publisher...
